description: Movies and games travel with you. with wireless game pad and 10 games. Enjoy your favorite movies, music, or photos on the go, plus let your kids have fun playing games with the built-in gaming feature and wireless controller. Philips PD703 Portable DVD player’s 7" LCD display lets you indulge in DVD movies, MP3-CD/CD music and JPEG photos wherever you go, and includes car adaptor and mounting strap, AV adaptor, and wireless game pad for hours of fun and entertainment.
title: Philips PD703/37 7-Inch LCD Portable DVD Player with Wireless Game Controller, White
